CustomField.formula: IF( CPDCredits_Generic__c >=2, IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Green"), IF( CPDCredits_Generic__c >=1, IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Red") ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Two credits must be from courses related to Generic Competencies.
CustomField.label: CPD Status - Generic Competency
